  1. https://www.ruc.pt

  3. https://www.ruc.pt/chat

    serious impact Ensure <iframe> and <frame> elements have an accessible name

    More information about the issue
    • cat.text-alternatives
    • wcag2a
    • wcag412
    • section508
    • section508.22.i
    • TTv5
    • TT12.d
    • EN-301-549
    • EN-9.4.1.2 
    • <iframe src="https://minnit.chat/chatRUC?embed&amp;&amp;nickname=" style="border:none;width:100vw;height:80vh;" allowtransparency="true"></iframe>
      Fix any of the following:
                  Element has no title attribute
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"
    • <iframe id="chat-iframe" allowtransparency="true" sandbox="allow-downloads allow-forms allow-modals allow-orientation-lock allow-pointer-lock allow-popups allow-popups-to-escape-sandbox allow-presentation allow-same-origin allow-scripts allow-top-navigation allow-top-navigation-by-user-activation" src="/chifr-redesign.html?mid=1738158904" style="border-width:0px;" scrolling="no">
      Fix any of the following:
                  Element has no title attribute
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

    serious impact Ensure each HTML document contains a non-empty <title> element

    More information about the issue
    • cat.text-alternatives
    • wcag2a
    • wcag242
    • TTv5
    • TT12.a
    • EN-301-549
    • EN-9.2.4.2
    • ACT 
    • <html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
      Fix any of the following:
                  Document does not have a non-empty <title> element

    • EN-301-549

      Fix any of the following:
                  The <html> element does not have a lang attribute

    More information about the issue

    • EN-301-549
    • EN-9.2.1.1
    • EN-9.2.1.3 
    • <div class="pb-20 p-8 md:py-8 md:px-16 text-sm md:text-lg w-full md:col-span-5 h-full md:overflow-y-auto scrolling-auto">
      Fix any of the following:
                  Element should have focusable content
                  Element should be focusable

  7. https://www.ruc.pt/grelha

    critical impact Ensure buttons have discernible text

    More information about the issue
    • cat.name-role-value
    • wcag2a
    • wcag412
    • section508
    • section508.22.a
    • TTv5
    • TT6.a
    • EN-301-549
    • EN-9.4.1.2
    • ACT 
    • <button class="w-full text-center border-l border-main-border align-middle col-span-1 hover:bg-main-text hover:text-main-bg bg-main-text text-main-bg ">
      Fix any of the following:
                  Element does not have inner text that is visible to screen readers
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute
                  Element does not have an implicit (wrapped) <label>
                  Element does not have an explicit <label>
                  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"
    • <button class="w-full text-center border-l border-main-border align-middle col-span-1 hover:bg-main-text hover:text-main-bg bg-main-bg text-main-text">
      Fix any of the following:
                  Element does not have inner text that is visible to screen readers
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute
                  Element does not have an implicit (wrapped) <label>
                  Element does not have an explicit <label>
                  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

    serious impact Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds

    More information about the issue
    • cat.color
    • wcag2aa
    • wcag143
    • TTv5
    • TT13.c
    • EN-301-549
    • EN-9.1.4.3
    • ACT 
    • <p class=" my-auto  flex-wrap text-xl syne">QUINTA-FEIRA</p>
      Fix any of the following:
                  Element has insufficient color contrast of 2.69 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #9c9e9e, font size: 15.0pt (20px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

    serious impact Ensure <svg> elements with an img, graphics-document or graphics-symbol role have an accessible text

      Fix any of the following:
                  Element child title is empty
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute

      Fix any of the following:
                  Element does not have an alt attribute
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute
                  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

      Fix all of the following:
                  Element is in tab order and does not have accessible text

                  Element does not have text that is visible to screen readers
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute

                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute
    • <svg stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" role="img" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="mr-3" height="24" width="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
      Fix any of the following:
                  Element child title is empty
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute

      Fix any of the following:
                  Element does not have an alt attribute
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute
                  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

    serious impact Ensure links have discernible text

    More information about the issue
    • cat.name-role-value

      Fix all of the following:
                  Element is in tab order and does not have accessible text
                
                Fix any of the following:
                  Element does not have text that is visible to screen readers
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute

    • <img loading="lazy" decoding="async" data-nimg="fill" class="object-cover w-full h-full" style="position:absolute;height:100%;width:100%;left:0;top:0;right:0;bottom:0;object-position:0% 0;color:transparent" sizes="100vw" srcset="/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F08%2F25114823%2FWhatsApp-Image-2023-08-17-at-20.50.15-e1692964155902.jpeg&amp;w=640&amp;q=75 640w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F08%2F25114823%2FWhatsApp-Image-2023-08-17-at-20.50.15-e1692964155902.jpeg&amp;w=750&amp;q=75 750w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F08%2F25114823%2FWhatsApp-Image-2023-08-17-at-20.50.15-e1692964155902.jpeg&amp;w=828&amp;q=75 828w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F08%2F25114823%2FWhatsApp-Image-2023-08-17-at-20.50.15-e1692964155902.jpeg&amp;w=1080&amp;q=75 1080w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F08%2F25114823%2FWhatsApp-Image-2023-08-17-at-20.50.15-e1692964155902.jpeg&amp;w=1200&amp;q=75 1200w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F08%2F25114823%2FWhatsApp-Image-2023-08-17-at-20.50.15-e1692964155902.jpeg&amp;w=1920&amp;q=75 1920w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F08%2F25114823%2FWhatsApp-Image-2023-08-17-at-20.50.15-e1692964155902.jpeg&amp;w=2048&amp;q=75 2048w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F08%2F25114823%2FWhatsApp-Image-2023-08-17-at-20.50.15-e1692964155902.jpeg&amp;w=3840&amp;q=75 3840w" src="/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F08%2F25114823%2FWhatsApp-Image-2023-08-17-at-20.50.15-e1692964155902.jpeg&amp;w=3840&amp;q=75">
      Fix any of the following:
                  Element does not have an alt attribute
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute
                  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

    serious impact Ensure links have discernible text

    More information about the issue
    • cat.name-role-value
    • wcag2a
    • wcag244
    • wcag412
    • section508
    • section508.22.a
    • TTv5
    • TT6.a
    • EN-301-549
    • EN-9.2.4.4
    • EN-9.4.1.2
    • ACT 
    • <a href="/podcast/coberturas-ruc/feed" target="_blank" rel="noopener">
      Fix all of the following:
                  Element is in tab order and does not have accessible text
                
                Fix any of the following:
                  Element does not have text that is visible to screen readers
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute

    serious impact Ensure <svg> elements with an img, graphics-document or graphics-symbol role have an accessible text

    More information about the issue
    • cat.text-alternatives
    • wcag2a
    • wcag111
    • section508
    • section508.22.a
    • TTv5
    • TT7.a
    • EN-301-549
    • EN-9.1.1.1
    • ACT 
    • <svg stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" role="img" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="w-6" height="2em" width="2em" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
      Fix any of the following:
                  Element child title is empty
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute
    • <svg stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" role="img" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="mr-3" height="24" width="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
      Fix any of the following:
                  Element child title is empty
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute

                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute
                  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

    serious impact Ensure links have discernible text

    More information about the issue
    • cat.name-role-value
    • wcag2a
    • wcag244
    • wcag412
    • section508
    • section508.22.a
    • TTv5
    • TT6.a
    • EN-301-549
    • EN-9.2.4.4
    • EN-9.4.1.2
    • ACT 
    • <a href="/podcast/coberturas-ruc/feed" target="_blank" rel="noopener">
      Fix all of the following:
                  Element is in tab order and does not have accessible text
                
                Fix any of the following:
                  Element does not have text that is visible to screen readers
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute

    serious impact Ensure <svg> elements with an img, graphics-document or graphics-symbol role have an accessible text

      Fix any of the following:
                  Element child title is empty
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute

                  Element has no title attribute

    • <img loading="lazy" decoding="async" data-nimg="fill" class="object-cover w-full h-full" style="position:absolute;height:100%;width:100%;left:0;top:0;right:0;bottom:0;object-position:0% 0;color:transparent" sizes="100vw" srcset="/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F08%2F26141422%2Flee-fields-2022-cr-rosie-cohe-photography.jpeg&amp;w=640&amp;q=75 640w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F08%2F26141422%2Flee-fields-2022-cr-rosie-cohe-photography.jpeg&amp;w=750&amp;q=75 750w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F08%2F26141422%2Flee-fields-2022-cr-rosie-cohe-photography.jpeg&amp;w=828&amp;q=75 828w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F08%2F26141422%2Flee-fields-2022-cr-rosie-cohe-photography.jpeg&amp;w=1080&amp;q=75 1080w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F08%2F26141422%2Flee-fields-2022-cr-rosie-cohe-photography.jpeg&amp;w=1200&amp;q=75 1200w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F08%2F26141422%2Flee-fields-2022-cr-rosie-cohe-photography.jpeg&amp;w=1920&amp;q=75 1920w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F08%2F26141422%2Flee-fields-2022-cr-rosie-cohe-photography.jpeg&amp;w=2048&amp;q=75 2048w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F08%2F26141422%2Flee-fields-2022-cr-rosie-cohe-photography.jpeg&amp;w=3840&amp;q=75 3840w" src="/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F08%2F26141422%2Flee-fields-2022-cr-rosie-cohe-photography.jpeg&amp;w=3840&amp;q=75">
      Fix any of the following:
                  Element does not have an alt attribute
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute
                  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

    serious impact Ensure links have discernible text

    More information about the issue
    • cat.name-role-value
    • wcag2a
    • wcag244
    • wcag412
    • section508
    • section508.22.a
    • TTv5
    • TT6.a
    • EN-301-549
    • EN-9.2.4.4
    • EN-9.4.1.2
    • ACT 
    • <a href="/podcast/coberturas-ruc/feed" target="_blank" rel="noopener">
      Fix all of the following:
                  Element is in tab order and does not have accessible text
                
                Fix any of the following:
                  Element does not have text that is visible to screen readers
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute

    serious impact Ensure <svg> elements with an img, graphics-document or graphics-symbol role have an accessible text

    More information about the issue
    • cat.text-alternatives
    • wcag2a
    • wcag111
    • section508
    • section508.22.a

    • TT7.a
    • EN-301-549
    • EN-9.1.1.1
    • ACT 
    • <svg stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" role="img" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="w-6" height="2em" width="2em" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
      Fix any of the following:
                  Element child title is empty
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute
    • <svg stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" role="img" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="mr-3" height="24" width="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
      Fix any of the following:
                  Element child title is empty
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute

    serious impact Ensure links have discernible text

    More information about the issue
    • cat.name-role-value
    • wcag2a
    • wcag244
    • wcag412
    • section508
    • section508.22.a
    • TTv5
    • TT6.a
    • EN-301-549
    • EN-9.2.4.4
    • EN-9.4.1.2
    • ACT 
    • <a href="/podcast/podcast-equal-steam/feed" target="_blank" rel="noopener">
      Fix all of the following:
                  Element is in tab order and does not have accessible text
                
                Fix any of the following:
                  Element does not have text that is visible to screen readers
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute

    serious impact Ensure <svg> elements with an img, graphics-document or graphics-symbol role have an accessible text

    More information about the issue
    • cat.text-alternatives
    • wcag2a
    • wcag111
    • section508
    • section508.22.a
    • TTv5
    • TT7.a
    • EN-301-549
    • EN-9.1.1.1
    • ACT 
    • <svg stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" role="img" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="w-6" height="2em" width="2em" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
      Fix any of the following:
                  Element child title is empty
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute
    • <svg stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" role="img" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="mr-3" height="24" width="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
      Fix any of the following:
                  Element child title is empty
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute

      Fix any of the following:
                  Element does not have an alt attribute
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute
                  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

    • <img loading="lazy" decoding="async" data-nimg="fill" class="object-cover w-full h-full" style="position:absolute;height:100%;width:100%;left:0;top:0;right:0;bottom:0;object-position:0% 0;color:transparent" sizes="100vw" srcset="/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F07%2F27003254%2FWhatsApp-Image-2023-06-27-at-12.42.37-7.jpeg&amp;w=640&amp;q=75 640w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F07%2F27003254%2FWhatsApp-Image-2023-06-27-at-12.42.37-7.jpeg&amp;w=750&amp;q=75 750w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F07%2F27003254%2FWhatsApp-Image-2023-06-27-at-12.42.37-7.jpeg&amp;w=828&amp;q=75 828w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F07%2F27003254%2FWhatsApp-Image-2023-06-27-at-12.42.37-7.jpeg&amp;w=1080&amp;q=75 1080w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F07%2F27003254%2FWhatsApp-Image-2023-06-27-at-12.42.37-7.jpeg&amp;w=1200&amp;q=75 1200w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F07%2F27003254%2FWhatsApp-Image-2023-06-27-at-12.42.37-7.jpeg&amp;w=1920&amp;q=75 1920w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F07%2F27003254%2FWhatsApp-Image-2023-06-27-at-12.42.37-7.jpeg&amp;w=2048&amp;q=75 2048w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F07%2F27003254%2FWhatsApp-Image-2023-06-27-at-12.42.37-7.jpeg&amp;w=3840&amp;q=75 3840w" src="/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F07%2F27003254%2FWhatsApp-Image-2023-06-27-at-12.42.37-7.jpeg&amp;w=3840&amp;q=75">
      Fix any of the following:
                  Element does not have an alt attribute
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute
                  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

    serious impact Ensure links have discernible text

    More information about the issue
    • cat.name-role-value
    • wcag2a
    • wcag244

    • section508
    • section508.22.a

    • EN-301-549
    • EN-9.2.4.4
    • EN-9.4.1.2
    • ACT 
    • <a href="/podcast/podcast-equal-steam/feed" target="_blank" rel="noopener">
      Fix all of the following:
                  Element is in tab order and does not have accessible text
                
                Fix any of the following:
                  Element does not have text that is visible to screen readers
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute

    serious impact Ensure <svg> elements with an img, graphics-document or graphics-symbol role have an accessible text

    More information about the issue

    • <svg stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" role="img" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="w-6" height="2em" width="2em" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
      Fix any of the following:
                  Element child title is empty
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute
    • <svg stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" role="img" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="mr-3" height="24" width="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
      Fix any of the following:

                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty

                  Element has no title attribute

    • <a href="/podcast/girabola/feed" target="_blank" rel="noopener">
      Fix all of the following:
                  Element is in tab order and does not have accessible text
                
                Fix any of the following:
                  Element does not have text that is visible to screen readers
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute

    serious impact Ensure <svg> elements with an img, graphics-document or graphics-symbol role have an accessible text

    More information about the issue
    • cat.text-alternatives
    • wcag2a
    • wcag111
    • section508
    • section508.22.a
    • TTv5
    • TT7.a
    • EN-301-549
    • EN-9.1.1.1
    • ACT 
    • <svg stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" role="img" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="w-6" height="2em" width="2em" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
      Fix any of the following:
                  Element child title is empty
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute
    • <svg stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" role="img" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="mr-3" height="24" width="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
      Fix any of the following:
                  Element child title is empty
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute

      Fix any of the following:
                  Element does not have an alt attribute
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute
                  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

                  Element is in tab order and does not have accessible text
                
                Fix any of the following:
                  Element does not have text that is visible to screen readers
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute
    • <a href="/podcast/bnk/feed" target="_blank" rel="noopener">
      Fix all of the following:
                  Element is in tab order and does not have accessible text
                
                Fix any of the following:
                  Element does not have text that is visible to screen readers
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute

    serious impact Ensure <svg> elements with an img, graphics-document or graphics-symbol role have an accessible text

    More information about the issue
    • cat.text-alternatives

    • wcag111

      Fix any of the following:
                  Element child title is empty
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute

                  Element does not have an alt attribute
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute
                  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

    • section508
    • section508.22.a
    • TTv5
    • TT7.a
    • TT7.b
    • EN-301-549
    • EN-9.1.1.1
    • ACT 
    • <img loading="lazy" decoding="async" data-nimg="fill" class="object-cover w-full h-full" style="position:absolute;height:100%;width:100%;left:0;top:0;right:0;bottom:0;object-position:0% 0;color:transparent" sizes="100vw" srcset="/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F08%2F18172734%2Fbnk6.jpg&amp;w=640&amp;q=75 640w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F08%2F18172734%2Fbnk6.jpg&amp;w=750&amp;q=75 750w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F08%2F18172734%2Fbnk6.jpg&amp;w=828&amp;q=75 828w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F08%2F18172734%2Fbnk6.jpg&amp;w=1080&amp;q=75 1080w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F08%2F18172734%2Fbnk6.jpg&amp;w=1200&amp;q=75 1200w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F08%2F18172734%2Fbnk6.jpg&amp;w=1920&amp;q=75 1920w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F08%2F18172734%2Fbnk6.jpg&amp;w=2048&amp;q=75 2048w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F08%2F18172734%2Fbnk6.jpg&amp;w=3840&amp;q=75 3840w" src="/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F08%2F18172734%2Fbnk6.jpg&amp;w=3840&amp;q=75">
      Fix any of the following:
                  Element does not have an alt attribute
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute
                  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

    serious impact Ensure links have discernible text

    More information about the issue
    • cat.name-role-value
    • wcag2a
    • wcag244
    • wcag412
    • section508
    • section508.22.a
    • TTv5
    • TT6.a
    • EN-301-549
    • EN-9.2.4.4
    • EN-9.4.1.2
    • ACT 
    • <a href="https://www.instagram.com/bnk.ruc/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">
      Fix all of the following:
                  Element is in tab order and does not have accessible text
                
                Fix any of the following:
                  Element does not have text that is visible to screen readers
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute
    • <a href="/podcast/bnk/feed" target="_blank" rel="noopener">

                  Element is in tab order and does not have accessible text

                  Element does not have text that is visible to screen readers
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute

      Fix any of the following:
                  Element child title is empty
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute

    • section508.22.a
    • TTv5
    • TT7.a
    • EN-301-549
    • EN-9.1.1.1
    • ACT 
    • <svg stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" role="img" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="w-6" height="2em" width="2em" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
      Fix any of the following:
                  Element child title is empty
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute
    • <svg stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" role="img" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="mr-3" height="24" width="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
      Fix any of the following:
                  Element child title is empty
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute

    critical impact Ensure <img> elements have alternative text or a role of none or presentation

    More information about the issue

    • <img loading="lazy" decoding="async" data-nimg="fill" class="object-cover w-full h-full" style="position:absolute;height:100%;width:100%;left:0;top:0;right:0;bottom:0;object-position:0% 0;color:transparent" sizes="100vw" srcset="/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F07%2F09001153%2FImagem-Programa.jpg&amp;w=640&amp;q=75 640w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F07%2F09001153%2FImagem-Programa.jpg&amp;w=750&amp;q=75 750w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F07%2F09001153%2FImagem-Programa.jpg&amp;w=828&amp;q=75 828w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F07%2F09001153%2FImagem-Programa.jpg&amp;w=1080&amp;q=75 1080w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F07%2F09001153%2FImagem-Programa.jpg&amp;w=1200&amp;q=75 1200w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F07%2F09001153%2FImagem-Programa.jpg&amp;w=1920&amp;q=75 1920w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F07%2F09001153%2FImagem-Programa.jpg&amp;w=2048&amp;q=75 2048w, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F07%2F09001153%2FImagem-Programa.jpg&amp;w=3840&amp;q=75 3840w" src="/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbucket.ruc.pt%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F07%2F09001153%2FImagem-Programa.jpg&amp;w=3840&amp;q=75">
      Fix any of the following:
                  Element does not have an alt attribute
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute
                  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

    serious impact Ensure links have discernible text

    More information about the issue
    • cat.name-role-value
    • wcag2a
    • wcag244
    • wcag412
    • section508
    • section508.22.a

    • EN-9.2.4.4
    • EN-9.4.1.2
    • ACT 
    • <a href="/podcast/paralelo-30-sul/feed" target="_blank" rel="noopener">
      Fix all of the following:
                  Element is in tab order and does not have accessible text
                
                Fix any of the following:
                  Element does not have text that is visible to screen readers
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute

    serious impact Ensure <svg> elements with an img, graphics-document or graphics-symbol role have an accessible text

    More information about the issue

                  Element child title is empty
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute
    • <svg stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" role="img" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="mr-3" height="24" width="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
      Fix any of the following:
                  Element child title is empty
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute

  77. https://www.ruc.pt/podcast/euterpe/euterpe-11-de-julho-de-2023-catarina-almeida

      Fix any of the following:
                  Element does not have an alt attribute
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute
                  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

      Fix all of the following:
                  Element is in tab order and does not have accessible text
                
                Fix any of the following:
                  Element does not have text that is visible to screen readers
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute

                  Element child title is empty

                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute
    • <svg stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" role="img" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="mr-3" height="24" width="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
      Fix any of the following:
                  Element child title is empty
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute

                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute

                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute

    serious impact Ensure <svg> elements with an img, graphics-document or graphics-symbol role have an accessible text

    More information about the issue
    • cat.text-alternatives
    • wcag2a
    • wcag111
    • section508
    • section508.22.a
    • TTv5
    • TT7.a
    • EN-301-549
    • EN-9.1.1.1
    • ACT 
    • <svg stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" role="img" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="w-6" height="2em" width="2em" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
      Fix any of the following:
                  Element child title is empty
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute

    • ACT 
    • <svg stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" role="img" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="w-6" height="2em" width="2em" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
      Fix any of the following:
                  Element child title is empty
                  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
                  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
                  Element has no title attribute
